sentences.en: As soon as we descend down the slope of sadness, we accelerate over the ever-feel-good acclivity of happiness.
sentences.cn: 一旦我们从痛苦的斜坡滑下去，我们就加速开始有快乐的感觉。

sentences.en: Three or four men ascended the little acclivity.
sentences.cn: 有三、四个战士爬上小丘.

sentences.en: Why did Ford's accelerator always have an accidental failure on acclivity ?
sentences.cn: 为什么福特的加速器在斜坡上总是有意外的出错？

sentences.en: Why did Ford's accelerator always have an accidental failure on acclivity?
sentences.cn: 为什么福特的加速器在斜坡上总是有意外的出错？

trans.tran_en: an upward slope, esp of the ground
